text: The Finnish SM-liiga is the name of the professional handball league of Finland. == Competition Format == The season begins with a regular season between the ten teams. The first six teams qualifies for the play-offs, the teams classified four to eight play another round-robin, while the last two plays a relegation round. == 2016/17 Season participants== The following 10 clubs compete in the SM-liiga during the 2016–17 season. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Team !City !Arena |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |Atlas |Vantaa |Energia Areena |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |BK-46
